TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Cache extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.IEnumerable
Public NotInheritable Class Cache Implements IEnumerable
public ref class Cache sealed : System::Collections::IEnumerable

summary.span: 實作 Web 應用程式的快取。

span.span: Implements the cache for a Web application.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建立一個執行個體，這個類別的每個應用程式網域，且只要在應用程式定義域會保持使用中仍有效。One instance of this class is created per application domain, and it remains valid as long as the application domain remains active. 這個類別的執行個體的資訊是透過`Cache`屬性物件或`Cache`屬性物件。Information about an instance of this class is available through the `Cache` property of the object or the `Cache` property of the object. > [!NOTE] > 類別並不適合用於 ASP.NET 應用程式之外。The class is not intended for use outside of ASP.NET applications. 它在設計和測試以提供 Web 應用程式的快取的 ASP.NET 中使用。It was designed and tested for use in ASP.NET to provide caching for Web applications. 對於其他類型的應用程式，例如主控台應用程式或 Windows Forms 應用程式，使用類別。For other types of applications, such as console applications or Windows Forms applications, use the class. ## Examples 下列範例為頁面的值指派給快取中，項目會顯示使用者，並通知它們從快取中移除項目時。The following example is a page that shows users the value assigned to an item in the cache, and then notifies them when the item is removed from the cache. 它會建立`RemovedCallback`方法簽章的`CacheItemRemovedCallback`委派，會移除快取項目，並使用時通知使用者列舉型別來告知它們為何它已被移除。It creates a `RemovedCallback` method, which has the signature of the `CacheItemRemovedCallback` delegate, to notify users when the cache item is removed, and it uses the enumeration to tell them why it was removed. 此外，它會使用屬性，以將物件新增至快取，然後擷取這些物件的值。In addition, it uses the property to add objects to the cache and retrieve the value of those objects. 在`AddItemToCache`方法，它會使用方法將項目新增至快取。In the `AddItemToCache` method, it uses the method to add an item to the cache. 若要使用`CacheItemRemovedCallback`委派，必須使用此方法將項目加入至快取或方法，因此，ASP.NET 可以自動讓適當的方法呼叫時已移除項目。To use the `CacheItemRemovedCallback` delegate, you must add an item to the cache with this method or the method, so that that ASP.NET can automatically make the proper method calls when the item is removed. 自訂`RemoveItemFromCache`方法會使用方法明確地刪除的項目從快取，造成`RemovedCallback`方法被叫用。The custom `RemoveItemFromCache` method uses the method to explicitly delete the item from the cache, causing the `RemovedCallback` method to be invoked. > [!NOTE] > 存取下列片段所模式化的快取的執行個體是屬於這個範例會繼承的物件。The instance of Cache that is accessed by the snippet below is a member of the object that this sample inherits. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Caching Examples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Caching Examples/CS/cachecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Caching Examples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Caching Examples/VB/cachevb.aspx#1)]

threadsafe.span: 此型別具備執行緒安全。

span.span: This type is thread safe.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

MemberSignature.Value: public object Add (string key, object value, System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency dependencies, DateTime absoluteExpiration, TimeSpan slidingExpiration, System.Web.Caching.CacheItemPriority priority, System.Web.Caching.CacheItemRemovedCallback onRemoveCallback);

.method public hidebysig instance object Add(string key, object value, class System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency dependencies, valuetype System.DateTime absoluteExpiration, valuetype System.TimeSpan slidingExpiration, valuetype System.Web.Caching.CacheItemPriority priority, class System.Web.Caching.CacheItemRemovedCallback onRemoveCallback) cil managed

Public Function Add (key As String, value As Object, dependencies As CacheDependency, absoluteExpiration As DateTime, slidingExpiration As TimeSpan, priority As CacheItemPriority, onRemoveCallback As CacheItemRemovedCallback) As Object

public: System::Object ^ Add(System::String ^ key, System::Object ^ value, System::Web::Caching::CacheDependency ^ dependencies, DateTime absoluteExpiration, TimeSpan slidingExpiration, System::Web::Caching::CacheItemPriority priority, System::Web::Caching::CacheItemRemovedCallback ^ onRemoveCallback);

param.name: key
param.span: 用來參考項目的快取索引鍵。

span.span: The cache key used to reference the item.

param.name: value
param.span: 加入至快取的項目。

span.span: The item to be added to the cache.

param.name: dependencies
param.span: 項目的檔案或快取索引鍵相依性。

span.span: The file or cache key dependencies for the item.

param.span: 任何相依性變更時，物件會變成無效並從快取中移除。

span.span: When any dependency changes, the object becomes invalid and is removed from the cache.

param.span: 如果沒有相依性，這個參數就會包含 。

span.span: If there are no dependencies, this parameter contains .

param.name: absoluteExpiration
param.span: 新增的物件過期並從快取中移除的時間。

span.span: The time at which the added object expires and is removed from the cache.

param.span: 如果使用的是滑動期限，則 absoluteExpiration 參數必須設為 。

span.span: If you are using sliding expiration, the absoluteExpiration parameter must be .

param.name: slidingExpiration
param.span: 上次存取加入物件的時間與該物件到期的時間之間隔。

span.span: The interval between the time the added object was last accessed and the time at which that object expires.

param.span: 如果這個值等於二十分鐘，那麼物件會在最後存取的二十分鐘後過期，並從快取中移除。

span.span: If this value is the equivalent of 20 minutes, the object expires and is removed from the cache 20 minutes after it is last accessed.

param.span: 如果使用的是絕對期限，則 slidingExpiration 參數必須設為 。

span.span: If you are using absolute expiration, the slidingExpiration parameter must be .

param.name: priority
param.span: 物件的相對花費，如 列舉型別所示。

span.span: The relative cost of the object, as expressed by the enumeration.

param.span: 在其清除物件時，快取會使用這個值；花費較低的物件會在花費較高的物件之前從快取移除。

span.span: The cache uses this value when it evicts objects; objects with a lower cost are removed from the cache before objects with a higher cost.

param.name: onRemoveCallback
param.span: 當物件從快取移除時，會呼叫委派 (如果有提供的話)。

span.span: A delegate that, if provided, is called when an object is removed from the cache.

param.span: 您可以使用這個在它們的物件從快取刪除時告知應用程式。

span.span: You can use this to notify applications when their objects are deleted from the cache.

summary.span: 使用相依性、期限和優先權原則，將指定項目加入 物件，並且您也可以從 移除插入項目時使用委派 (Delegate) 來告知您的應用程式。

span.span: Adds the specified item to the object with dependencies, expiration and priority policies, and a delegate you can use to notify your application when the inserted item is removed from the .

returns.span: 如果加入的項目先前已儲存在快取中，則為表示此項目的物件，否則為 。

span.span: An object that represents the item that was added if the item was previously stored in the cache; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果具有相同的項目至這個方法的呼叫將失敗`key`參數已經儲存在`Cache`。Calls to this method will fail if an item with the same `key` parameter is already stored in the `Cache`. 若要覆寫現有`Cache`使用相同的項目`key`參數，使用方法。To overwrite an existing `Cache` item using the same `key` parameter, use the method. 您不能同時設定`absoluteExpiration`和`slidingExpiration`參數。You cannot set both the `absoluteExpiration` and `slidingExpiration` parameters. 如果您想在特定時間過期的快取項目，設定`absoluteExpiration`參數為特定的時間，而`slidingExpiration`參數。If you intend the cache item to expire at a specific time, you set the `absoluteExpiration` parameter to the specific time, and the `slidingExpiration` parameter to . 如果您想要快取項目在一段時間之後過期後經過上一次存取項目，則設定`slidingExpiration`到期時間間隔的參數和`absoluteExpiration`參數。If you intend the cache item to expire after a certain amount of time has passed since the item was last accessed, you set the `slidingExpiration` parameter to the expiration interval, and the `absoluteExpiration` parameter to . ## Examples 下列範例會建立`AddItemToCache`方法。The following example creates an `AddItemToCache` method. 當呼叫此方法時，它會設定`itemRemoved`屬性`false`並註冊`onRemove`方法的新執行個體委派。When this method is called, it sets an `itemRemoved` property to `false` and registers an `onRemove` method with a new instance of the delegate. 委派的簽章用於`RemovedCallback`方法。The delegate's signature is used in the `RemovedCallback` method. `AddItemToCache`方法接著會檢查相關聯的值`Key1`快取中的索引鍵。The `AddItemToCache` method then checks the value associated with the `Key1` key in the cache. 如果值為`null`、`Add`方法將項目放在快取索引鍵為`Key1`，值為`Value 1`，絕對期限為 60 秒，而較高的快取的優先順序。If the value is `null`, the `Add` method places an item in the cache with a key of `Key1`, a value of `Value 1`, an absolute expiration of 60 seconds, and a high cache priority. 它也會使用`onRemove`做為引數的方法。It also uses the `onRemove` method as an argument. 這可讓`RemovedCallback`要從快取中移除此項目時呼叫的方法。This allows the `RemovedCallback` method to be called when this item is removed from the cache. > [!NOTE] > 如需如何使用的範例類別和委派，請參閱[快取應用程式資料](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/206f977d-7860-4d20-bdd5-c3b3d8479f3d)。For examples of how to use the class and the delegate, see [Caching Application Data](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/206f977d-7860-4d20-bdd5-c3b3d8479f3d). [!code-csharp[System.Web.Caching Examples#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Caching Examples/CS/cachecs.aspx#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Caching Examples#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Caching Examples/VB/cachevb.aspx#3)]

span.span: The or parameter is set to .

exception.span: 參數設定為小於 或多於一年。

span.span: The parameter is set to less than or more than one year.

exception.span: 您要為 加入的項目都會設定 和 參數。

span.span: The and parameters are both set for the item you are trying to add to the .

summary.span: 取得快取中所儲存的項目數。

span.span: Gets the number of items stored in the cache.

value.span: 快取中所儲存的項目數。

span.span: The number of items stored in the cache.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 監視應用程式的效能時，或使用 ASP.NET 追蹤功能時，這個屬性可以是很有用。This property can be useful when monitoring your application's performance or when using ASP.NET tracing functionality. ## Examples 下列範例會取得的值`Count`屬性，將它轉換為字串，並將指派到字串屬性Web 伺服器控制項`Label1`。The following example obtains the value of the `Count` property, converts it to a string, and assigns the string to the property of a Web server control, `Label1`. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Caching.Cache.Count#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Caching.Cache.Count/CS/cachecountcs.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Caching.Cache.Count#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Caching.Cache.Count/VB/cachecountvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public long EffectivePercentagePhysicalMemoryLimit { get; }
.property instance int64 EffectivePercentagePhysicalMemoryLimit
Public ReadOnly Property EffectivePercentagePhysicalMemoryLimit As Long
public: property long EffectivePercentagePhysicalMemoryLimit { long get(); };

summary.span: 取得應用程式可以消耗的實體記憶體百分比，超過這個百分比，ASP.NET 就會開始移除快取區中的項目。

span.span: Gets the percentage of physical memory that can be consumed by an application before ASP.NET starts removing items from the cache.

value.span: 應用程式可用的實體記憶體百分比。

span.span: The percentage of physical memory available to the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會傳回可用於應用程式的實體記憶體的百分比。The property returns the percentage of physical memory that is available to the application. 可用百分比變低時，快取演算法會開始從快取中移除項目。When the available percentage becomes low, the cache algorithm begins removing items from the cache. 屬性可以設定與`percentagePhysicalMemoryUsedLimit`屬性[快取項目 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述） 快取](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/68fa0040-5abf-4c73-93fc-17e3c6af3299)應用程式的組態檔中的項目。The property can be set with the `percentagePhysicalMemoryUsedLimit` attribute of the [cache Element for caching (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/68fa0040-5abf-4c73-93fc-17e3c6af3299) element in the application's configuration file. 如果`percentagePhysicalMemoryUsedLimit`屬性未設定，快取演算法決定快取的大小上限和計算屬性。If the `percentagePhysicalMemoryUsedLimit` attribute is not set, the cache algorithm determines the maximum size of the cache, and the property is calculated. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public long EffectivePrivateBytesLimit { get; }
.property instance int64 EffectivePrivateBytesLimit
Public ReadOnly Property EffectivePrivateBytesLimit As Long
public: property long EffectivePrivateBytesLimit { long get(); };

summary.span: 取得快取可用的位元組數目。

span.span: Gets the number of bytes available for the cache.

value.span: 快取可用的位元組數目。

span.span: The number of bytes available for the cache.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會傳回可由應用程式處理序的位元組數目。The property returns the number of bytes that can be used by the application process. 一旦達到此限制時，快取演算法開始積極地清除快取。Once this limit is reached, the cache algorithm begins aggressively scavenging the cache. 屬性可以設定與`privateBytesLimit`屬性[快取項目 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述） 快取](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/68fa0040-5abf-4c73-93fc-17e3c6af3299)應用程式的組態檔中的項目。The property can be set with the `privateBytesLimit` attribute of the [cache Element for caching (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/68fa0040-5abf-4c73-93fc-17e3c6af3299) element in the application's configuration file. 當`privateBytesLimit`屬性未設定，快取演算法決定快取的大小上限和屬性包含演算法所選擇的大小。When the `privateBytesLimit` attribute is not set, the cache algorithm determines the maximum size of the cache, and the property contains the size chosen by the algorithm. ## Examples

summary.span: 擷取字典列舉程式，用來逐一查看金鑰設定及其在快取中所包含的值。

span.span: Retrieves a dictionary enumerator used to iterate through the key settings and their values contained in the cache.

returns.span: 要在整個 物件中重複的列舉值。

span.span: An enumerator to iterate through the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 項目可以加入或移除從快取，而這個方法列舉的項目之間。Items can be added to or removed from the cache while this method is enumerating through the items. ## Examples 下列範例會建立物件`CacheEnum`，並使用`GetEnumerator`方法。The following example creates an object, `CacheEnum`, using the `GetEnumerator` method. 列舉值會移到快取中，將每個快取項目的值，轉換為字串，並再將值寫入至 Web Form 頁面。The enumerator moves through the cache, converts the value of each cached item to a string, and then writes the values to a Web Forms page. [!code-csharp[Cache.GetEnumerator#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Cache.GetEnumerator/CS/getenumcs.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[Cache.GetEnumerator#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Cache.GetEnumerator/VB/getenumvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會覆寫現有的快取項目索引鍵符合`key`參數。This method will overwrite an existing cache item whose key matches the `key` parameter. 使用這個多載的快取中加入的物件`Insert`方法已插入不含檔案或快取相依性，優先順序為、 滑動逾期值，和絕對逾期值的。The object added to the cache using this overload of the `Insert` method is inserted with no file or cache dependencies, a priority of , a sliding expiration value of , and an absolute expiration value of . ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何將項目插入至應用程式的快取。The following example demonstrates how to insert an item into an application's cache. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會覆寫現有的快取項目索引鍵符合`key`參數。This method will overwrite an existing cache item whose key matches the `key` parameter. 使用這個多載的快取中加入的物件`Insert`方法已插入不含檔案或快取相依性，優先順序為、 滑動逾期值，和絕對逾期值的。The object added to the cache using this overload of the `Insert` method is inserted with no file or cache dependencies, a priority of , a sliding expiration value of , and an absolute expiration value of . ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何將項目插入快取相依性的 XML 設定檔的應用程式的快取。The following example demonstrates how to insert an item into an application's cache with a cache dependency on an XML configuration file. param.span: 插入物件過期並從快取移除的時間。

param.span: 為避免當地時間發生問題 (例如，從標準時間變更為日光節約時間)，請使用 而非 做為這個參數值。

span.span: To avoid possible issues with local time such as changes from standard time to daylight saving time, use rather than for this parameter value.

param.span: 如果使用的是絕對期限，則 slidingExpiration 參數必須設為 。

span.span: If you are using absolute expiration, the slidingExpiration parameter must be .

param.name: slidingExpiration
param.span: 在上次存取所插入物件的時間以及該物件到期時間之間的間隔。

span.span: The interval between the time the inserted object is last accessed and the time at which that object expires.

param.span: 如果此值相當於 20 分鐘，物件將會到期，而且會從上次存取之後的 20 分鐘從快取中移除。

span.span: If this value is the equivalent of 20 minutes, the object will expire and be removed from the cache 20 minutes after it was last accessed.

param.span: 如果使用的是滑動期限，則 absoluteExpiration 參數必須設為 。

span.span: If you are using sliding expiration, the absoluteExpiration parameter must be .

summary.span: 使用相依性和期限原則將物件插入 。

span.span: Inserts an object into the with dependencies and expiration policies.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法將覆寫現有`Cache`具有相同的項目`key`參數。This method will overwrite an existing `Cache` item with the same `key` parameter. 如果`slidingExpiration`參數設定為，滑動期限會停用。If the `slidingExpiration` parameter is set to , sliding expiration is disabled. 如果您設定`slidingExpiration`參數大於、`absoluteExpiration`參數設定為中包含的值加`slidingExpiration`參數。If you set the `slidingExpiration` parameter to greater than , the `absoluteExpiration` parameter is set to plus the value contained in the `slidingExpiration` parameter. 如果項目會從快取要求之前所指定的時間量`absoluteExpiration`參數，此項目將會放置於快取，和`absoluteExpiration`再次設定為`DateTime.Now`中包含的值加`slidingExpiration`參數。If the item is requested from the cache before the amount of time specified by the `absoluteExpiration` parameter, the item will be placed in the cache again, and `absoluteExpiration` will again be set to `DateTime.Now` plus the value contained in the `slidingExpiration` parameter. 如果項目未要求從快取中的日期之前`absoluteExpiration`參數，此項目會從快取移除。If the item is not requested from the cache before the date in the `absoluteExpiration` parameter, the item is removed from the cache. 。. 使用這個方法多載，插入快取中加入的項目會插入優先順序為。The item added to the cache using this overload of the insert method is inserted with a priority of . ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何將項目插入快取的應用程式絕對期限。The following example demonstrates how to insert an item into an application's cache with an absolute expiration. > [!NOTE] > 這種形式的自`Insert`方法支援快取相依性，如果此項目沒有任何相依性，您必須宣告`dependency`參數做為`null`(`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中) 以逗號分隔清單中的參數。Since this form of the `Insert` method supports cache dependencies, if the item has no dependencies, you must declare the `dependency` parameter as `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) in the comma-delimited list of parameters. [!code-csharp[Classic Cache.Insert2 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Cache.Insert2 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Cache.Insert2 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Cache.Insert2 Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 下列範例會示範如何將項目插入快取使用滑動期限。The following example demonstrates how to insert an item into the cache with a sliding expiration. [!code-csharp[Classic Cache.Insert2 Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Cache.Insert2 Example/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic Cache.Insert2 Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Cache.Insert2 Example/VB/source.vb#2)]

span.span: You can use this to update the cached item and ensure that it is not removed from the cache.

summary.span: 從快取區移除項目之前，將物件連同相依性、期限原則及可用來通知應用程式的委派一併插入 物件中。

span.span: Inserts an object into the object together with dependencies, expiration policies, and a delegate that you can use to notify the application before the item is removed from the cache.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可讓您快取中插入新項目，並提供從快取移除項目之前呼叫的委派。The method enables you to insert a new item in the cache and provide a delegate that is called before the item is removed from the cache. 在委派中，您可以更新快取的項目，並藉此防止它正在從快取中移除。In the delegate, you can update the cached item and thereby prevent it from being removed from the cache. 這個方法將覆寫現有`Cache`具有相同的項目`key`參數。This method will overwrite an existing `Cache` item with the same `key` parameter. 您不能同時設定`absoluteExpiration`和`slidingExpiration`參數。You cannot set both the `absoluteExpiration` and `slidingExpiration` parameters. 如果您想在特定時間過期的快取項目，設定`absoluteExpiration`參數為特定的時間，而`slidingExpiration`參數。If you intend the cache item to expire at a specific time, you set the `absoluteExpiration` parameter to the specific time, and the `slidingExpiration` parameter to . 如果您想要快取項目來設定項目之後的時間週期之後過期一次被存取，則設定`slidingExpiration`參數的到期間隔，以及您要設定`absoluteExpiration`參數。If you intend the cache item to expire after a set period of time since the item was last accessed, you set the `slidingExpiration` parameter to the expiration interval, and you set the `absoluteExpiration` parameter to .

param.name: priority
param.span: 與儲存在快取中其他項目相關的物件之花費，如 列舉型別所示。

span.span: The cost of the object relative to other items stored in the cache, as expressed by the enumeration.

param.span: 當快取清除物件時會用到這個值；花費較低的物件會在花費較高的物件之前從快取中移除。

span.span: This value is used by the cache when it evicts objects; objects with a lower cost are removed from the cache before objects with a higher cost.

param.name: onRemoveCallback
param.span: 當物件從快取移除時，將會呼叫委派 (如果有提供的話)。

span.span: A delegate that, if provided, will be called when an object is removed from the cache.

param.span: 您可以使用這個在它們的物件從快取刪除時告知應用程式。

span.span: You can use this to notify applications when their objects are deleted from the cache.

summary.span: 使用相依性、期限和優先權原則，將指定項目插入 物件，並且您也可以從 移除插入項目時使用委派來告知您的應用程式。

span.span: Inserts an object into the object with dependencies, expiration and priority policies, and a delegate you can use to notify your application when the inserted item is removed from the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法將覆寫現有`Cache`具有相同的項目`key`參數。This method will overwrite an existing `Cache` item with the same `key` parameter. 您不能同時設定`absoluteExpiration`和`slidingExpiration`參數。You cannot set both the `absoluteExpiration` and `slidingExpiration` parameters. 如果您想在特定時間過期的快取項目，設定`absoluteExpiration`參數為特定的時間，而`slidingExpiration`參數。If you intend the cache item to expire at a specific time, you set the `absoluteExpiration` parameter to the specific time, and the `slidingExpiration` parameter to . 如果您想要快取項目在一段時間之後過期，已經過一次存取項目，您設定`slidingExpiration`到期時間間隔的參數和`absoluteExpiration`參數。If you intend the cache item to expire after a certain amount of time has passed since the last access to the item, you set the `slidingExpiration` parameter to the expiration interval, and the `absoluteExpiration` parameter to . ## Examples 下列範例示範如何插入您的應用程式時，指派項目高優先權`Cache`物件。The following example demonstrates how to assign an item high priority when you insert it into your application's `Cache` object. > [!NOTE] > 如需有關如何使用這個方法與委派，請參閱[How to： 通知應用程式時移除項目是從快取](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/38c33aa0-afe9-40ba-a1a4-1ebab95286ef)。For more information about how to use this method with the delegate, see [How to: Notify an Application When an Item Is Removed from the Cache](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/38c33aa0-afe9-40ba-a1a4-1ebab95286ef). [!code-csharp[Classic Cache.Insert3 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Cache.Insert3 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Cache.Insert3 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Cache.Insert3 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

.property instance object Item(string)
Default Public Property Item(key As String) As Object
public: property System::Object ^ default[System::String ^] { System::Object ^ get(System::String ^ key); void set(System::String ^ key, System::Object ^ value); };

param.name: key
param.span: 物件，表示快取項目的索引鍵。

span.span: A object that represents the key for the cache item.

summary.span: 取得或設定在指定索引鍵的快取項目。

span.span: Gets or sets the cache item at the specified key.
The specified cache item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個屬性，擷取指定的快取項目值，或將項目和索引鍵為其新增至快取。You can use this property to retrieve the value of a specified cache item, or to add an item and a key for it to the cache. 加入快取項目使用屬性就相當於呼叫方法。Adding a cache item using the property is equivalent to calling the method. ## Examples 下列範例會使用`Item`屬性，以擷取快取的物件相關聯的值`Key1`索引鍵。The following example uses the `Item` property to retrieve the value of a cached object associated with the `Key1` key. 然後它會使用方法，將寫入 Web Form 網頁上的值和簡介文字和 B HTML 項目。It then uses the method to write the value and introductory text and the B HTML element to a Web Forms page. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Caching Examples#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Caching Examples/CS/cachecs.aspx#5)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Caching Examples#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Caching Examples/VB/cachevb.aspx#5)] 下列範例會示範使用此屬性的文字方塊中的值插入快取。The following example demonstrates using this property to insert the value of a text box into the cache. [!code-csharp[Classic Cache.this Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Cache.this Example/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic Cache.this Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Cache.this Example/VB/source.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static readonly DateTime NoAbsoluteExpiration;
.field public static initonly valuetype System.DateTime NoAbsoluteExpiration
Public Shared ReadOnly NoAbsoluteExpiration As DateTime
public: static initonly DateTime NoAbsoluteExpiration;

summary.span: 在 方法呼叫中的 參數中使用，以指示該項目應該永不過期。

span.span: Used in the parameter in an method call to indicate the item should never expire.

summary.span: 此欄位為唯讀。

span.span: This field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用時，此欄位會設定`absoluteExpiration`參數等於，它是一個常數代表最大可能`DateTime`值 12/31/9999 11:59:59 PM。When used, this field sets the `absoluteExpiration` parameter equal to , which is a constant representing the largest possible `DateTime` value, 12/31/9999 11:59:59 PM. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用`NoAbsoluteExpiration`插入中的項目時，停用絕對到期日欄位`Cache`。The following example demonstrates how to use the `NoAbsoluteExpiration` field to disable absolute expirations when inserting an item in the `Cache`. [!code-csharp[Classic Cache.NoAbsoluteExpiration Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Cache.NoAbsoluteExpiration Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Cache.NoAbsoluteExpiration Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Cache.NoAbsoluteExpiration Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

.field public static initonly valuetype System.TimeSpan NoSlidingExpiration
Public Shared ReadOnly NoSlidingExpiration As TimeSpan
public: static initonly TimeSpan NoSlidingExpiration;

summary.span: 使用來做為 或 方法呼叫中的 參數以停用變動性期限。

span.span: Used as the parameter in an or method call to disable sliding expirations.

summary.span: 此欄位為唯讀。

span.span: This field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用時，此欄位會設定`slidingExpiration`參數欄位有常數值為零。When used, this field sets the `slidingExpiration` parameter to the field, which has a constant value of zero. 按照所使用的快取的項目到期`absoluteExpiration`參數相關聯`Insert`或`Add`方法呼叫。The cached item expires in accordance with the `absoluteExpiration` parameter associated with the `Insert` or `Add` method call. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用 Insert 方法，將項目加入物件使用`NoSlidingExpiration`欄位。The following example demonstrates how to use the Insert method to add an item to the object using the `NoSlidingExpiration` field. [!code-csharp[Classic Cache.NoSlidingExpiration Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Cache.NoSlidingExpiration Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Cache.NoSlidingExpiration Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Cache.NoSlidingExpiration Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會建立`RemoveItemFromCache`方法。The following example creates a `RemoveItemFromCache` method. 當呼叫此方法時，它會使用檢查快取是否包含物件相關聯的屬性`Key1`機碼值。When this method is called, it uses the property to check whether the cache contains an object that is associated with a `Key1` key value. 若是如此，`Remove`呼叫方法來移除該物件。If it does, the `Remove` method is called to remove the object. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Caching Examples#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Caching Examples/CS/cachecs.aspx#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Caching Examples#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Caching Examples/VB/cachevb.aspx#4)]

summary.span: 傳回列舉值，可逐一查看 物件集合。

span.span: Returns an enumerator that can iterate through the object collection.

returns.span: 可逐一查看 物件集合的列舉值。

span.span: An enumerator that can iterate through the object collection.
